dct_title_s: Syria : route of the American Archaeological Expedition of 1899-1900 / A.R. Ohman, cartographer and engraver. [copy 1]
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Also shows Bedouin encampments, tombs of saints, minarets, ruins, and towers. "Based upon map by Dr. Richard Kiepert, published with Baron von Oppenheim's 'Vom Mittelmeere zum Persischen Golf' in 1899."
dct_subject_sm: Oppenheim, Max Freiherr von 1860-1946—Vom Mittelmeer zum Persischen Golf durch den Haurän, die Syrische Wüste und Mesopotamien
